scripts.test: mocha --import=tsx -r tsconfig-paths/register 'test/unit/**/*.spec.ts' # tsconfig-paths/register helps resolve imports in tests
scripts.package: mkdir -p dist && cp -r js/src dist && cp package*.json dist && cd dist && yarn --prod && echo $(git rev-parse --short HEAD) > COMMIT_HASH && zip -r function.zip .
scripts.verify: rm -rf js dist && yarn lint && yarn test && yarn compile && yarn package
